name: Valchor Quest
description:
You are a soldier on a mission. Charged with retrieving a strength-enhancing serum from an enemy research base, you must use your brains and brawn to find the mysterious substance your superiors call a “game-changer” – and get out of the facility alive. Are you up to the task?

Features:

  • Make game-altering choices
  • Explore multiple paths
  • Complete timed battles
  • Solve unique puzzles
  • Customize your adventure
